headline.main: Arrival of the Star of the West.; News from Central America, the South Pacific, and New-Granada. TWO WEEKS LATER FROM CALIFORNIA. $1,446,175 IN TREASURE.

docs.lead_paragraph: The United States Mail steamship Star of the West, A. G. GRAY, Esq., commanding, from Aspinwall on the 3d of June, with the California mails of May 20, and $1,446,175 in treasure, arrived at this port on Saturday morning. The Pacific Mail Steamship Company's steamer John L. Stephens, W. F. LAPIDGE, Esq., Commander, arrived at Panama, from San Francisco, June 3, at 10 A.M. Found the port of Manzanilla blockaded by Mexican ships-of-war.

docs.snippet: Important from Mexico. A  LOAN IMPOSED ON FOREIGNERS-- GLOOMY CONDITION OF AFFAIRS--DEFEAT OF THE ZULOAGA FORCES--SUPPRESSION OF THE NEWSPAPERS, ETC. The steamship Tennessee has arrived from Vera Citiz 7th instant, with important news from Mexico.
docs.lead_paragraph: Important from Mexico. A LOAN IMPOSED ON FOREIGNERS-- GLOOMY CONDITION OF AFFAIRS--DEFEAT OF THE ZULOAGA FORCES--SUPPRESSION OF THE NEWSPAPERS, ETC. The steamship Tennessee has arrived from Vera Citiz 7th instant, with important news from Mexico.

docs.snippet: A market ought to be as clean as a church, for at the best, when in use, it is not a place to tempt one for delicious odors, nor per se is it a lovely place for promenade. To enjoy a stroll through stalls of dead meats, past tables set with lard and...

headline.main: OUR MARKETS.; Their Condition--Why they Can't be Cleaned--Rats and their Revels.

docs.lead_paragraph: A market ought to be as clean as a church, for at the best, when in use, it is not a place to tempt one for delicious odors, nor per se is it a lovely place for promenade. To enjoy a stroll through stalls of dead meats, past tables set with lard and dubious butter, tubs of tripe and slaes of fish that Ethiotans are dressing, is rather a matter of education than of instruct.

docs.snippet: A New Way to recover Stolen Goods--Thirty Thefts by a Model Servant Girl. Saturday evening last, Officer WILSON, of the Third Precinct, arrested a girl named MARGARET NOLAN, alias MARGARET HOLLAHAN, on complaint of ELLEN COLLINS, NO. 57...
docs.lead_paragraph: A New Way to recover Stolen Goods--Thirty Thefts by a Model Servant Girl. Saturday evening last, Officer WILSON, of the Third Precinct, arrested a girl named MARGARET NOLAN, alias MARGARET HOLLAHAN, on complaint of ELLEN COLLINS, NO. 57 Washington-street, New-York, for larceny.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; BOARD OF HEALTH. FOUND DROWNED. CAUTION TO PEOPLE REPAIRING. DESCENT ON AN INFAMOUS HOUSE. The Melting ?? a Nuisance. docs.abstract: Witness Lauth swears defence tried to corrupt him
docs.lead_paragraph: Both of the lines leading South were prostrated by the storm yesterday afternoon, and such reports of Congressional proceedings as we have been able to obtain, came via Peiladelphia, Pittsburg, Cleveland and Buffalo, traversing a distance of over a thousand miles, and are necessarily imperfect.

headline.main: LAW INTELLIGENCE.; UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT COURT OF GENEIRAL SESSIONS. SUPERIOR COURT- SUPREME COURT. A Suit of the Pilot Commissioners.

docs.snippet: The City has been exulting for some months in the prospect of having a CENTRAL PARK, worthy of the City, and affording means of recreation and of health to the millions who will, ere long, inhabit this Island. The initial steps towards it were...

headline.main: The Central Park-Is it to be Discontinued ?

docs.lead_paragraph: The City has been exulting for some months in the prospect of having a CENTRAL PARK, worthy of the City, and affording means of recreation and of health to the millions who will, ere long, inhabit this Island. The initial steps towards it were successful.

docs.snippet: The screw-steamship Kangaroo, from Liverpool at 9 o'clock, on the morning of Wednesday, the 26th of May, arrived at this port yesterday morning. The steamship Arabia, from New-York, arrived out at Liverpool at 10:15 P. M., on the 23d of May.

headline.main: FOUR DAYS LATER FROM EUROPE; Cotton Lower---Consols 97 7-8. NEWS FROM INDIA AND CUNIA. The Atlantic Telegraph Experimental Trip. The News of the Late Aggressions in England. Refusal of Napics to Satisfy the British Demand. ARRIVAL OF THE KANGAROO. Views of the British Press on the Movement to Abrogate the Clayton-Bulwer Treaty.

docs.abstract: Report of Aldermanic Committee on a further appropriation
docs.lead_paragraph: The Board of Aldermen. THE STREET COMMISSIONER REFUSES TO RECOGNIZE THE ACTS OF DEVLIN AND CONOVER--ONE HUNDRED AND FIFTY THOUSAND DOLLARS INVOLVED--THE FINANCE COMMITTEE CENSURE THE CENTRAL PARK COMMISSIONERS. The Board of Aldermen met, last evening, President CHANCE in the Chair.
